songs.title: Buffie the Body
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
(I'ma die today, nigga, but you gon’ die too, nigga)
(Bring 'em hoes in)
(You know what I'm sayin’? I don't give a fuck-)
I'm in the Southside every Friday
(Y'all niggas doin' too much)
(You know what I'm sayin'? Flat shit)
(Y'all niggas doin’ too much wit’ it)
(This the this I be talkin' about)
(29 shit, nigga)
I’m in the Southside every Friday

[Chorus]
Buffie the Body, Buffie the Body
My bit' got bodies, this stick got bodies
Better call somebody, better call somebody
Better call somebody
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I’ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, I'm gon' do that

[Verse 1]
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
Yeah, I'm in the spot right now, got a Glock in the bookbag
I'm in the spot right now, four pints in the bookbag
Ooh, got a lil' badass bih and, yeah, she throw back
Got my hand on my gun right now, lil' bitch, 'cause I'm on them Perkies
Got my hand on my gun right now, lil' nigga, 'cause I'm on them- (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
I'm too high, high as hell (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
I was locked behind the cell (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Came out and gave 'em hell (Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Came out and gave 'em hell (Hell, hell)

[Chorus]
Buffie the Body, Buffie the Body
My bit' got bodies, this stick got bodies
Better call somebody, better call somebody
Better call somebody
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma pick that up, I'm gon' do that

[Verse 2]
Fuck that ho, yeah, I do that
Uh, get that money, then we fly back
Yeah, I got bitches on the callback
I got bitches, I don't call back
You know how I'm bomin', whoa (What?)
You know how we comin', whoa (What? What?)
Smoke a lot of dope, smoke a lot of dope
By myself, I'm alone
Hold up, I'm alone (Check it out), I'm alone
Yeah (You know what I'm sayin', Flat shit), I'm Vlone

[Chorus]
Buffie the Body, Buffie the Body
My bit' got bodies, this stick got bodies
Better call somebody, better call somebody
Better call somebody
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that
You don't want no smoke, you don't wanna do that
I'ma set that up, my lil' boy gon' do that

[Outro]
(I'ma die today, nigga, but you gon' die too, nigga)
(Bring 'em hoes in)
(You know what I'm sayin'? I don't give a fuck-)
I'm in the Southside every Friday
(Bitch so happy, my bitch so happy, my bitch so happy)
I'm in the Southside every Friday
I'm in the Southside every Friday
